### [](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17590747?extsite=MTc1OTA3NDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) Aggregate and Riprap Production Contract Notification
**Notice ID**: EZ899-240738
**Solicitation ID**: WS4236229889

**Project Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of [insert department name], invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Aggregate and Riprap Production contract.

**Contract Details**

*   **Location**: [Km 262 to Km 922 of the Alaska Highway, British Columbia]
*   **Contract Term**: January 19, 2024, to March 31, 2025
*   **Scope of Work**: The contract includes the crushing, hauling, and stockpiling of aggregates (16.0mm B.S.T. and 12.5mm sanding aggregates) and riprap. Additionally, the contractor will be required to supply a crawler tractor complete with a ripper and 260-359 FWHP for pit clean-up after completion of crushing aggregates.

**Optional Work**
Optional work may be awarded to the contractor during the project at the sole discretion of the Departmental Representative. This optional work will be undertaken by the contractor upon receipt of a signed change order.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the contractor.

**Trade Agreements**
This contract is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://cfta-ace.ca/) and [Canadian International Trade Tribunal](https://www.citt-tcce.gc.ca/).

**Procurement Category**
This contract falls under the category of [CNST - Construction Service - Transportation Infrastructure](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders/pdf/procurement_category/en/CNST?ru=procurementCategory#/).

**Timeline**

*   Bid Closing Date and Time: October 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM (PST)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: January 19, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Contact Information**

*   **Name**: Summer Wong (SPAC<PSPC>)
*   **Email**: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
